name: TP Final CNAM
description:
For the subject "Game Conception" in the CNAM-ENJMIN, we were asked to do a few tasks.

In here you'll find:

-A character model with it's articulations correctly placed

-An environment with a chilling ambiance

-A boid task where every bird navigates organically following simple rules

-An audio scene where you can see the impact of the reverb effect

-A player controller

-An animation example

-A mini infiltration game taking advantage of the NavMesh intergrated in Unity

It was a fun project and I learned a lot!
